content.raw:
I don't think we should have a "World" item in the Model List.

Also, `max_step_size` and `real_time_update_rate` should be within the physics SDF block, not the world block.

The 'physics' block should be modified to support global properties that are relevant to Physics and engine specific properties. For example:


```
#!xml

<sdf version='1.4'>
  <world name='default'>
    <physics>
      <max_step_size>0.001</max_step_size>
      <real_time_update_rate>1000</real_time_update_rate>

      <engine type='ode'>
          All of the ODE parameters.
      </engine>

      <engine type='bullet'>
          All of the Bullet parameters.
      </engine>

      <engine type='simbody'>
          All of the SimBody parameters.
      </engine>

    </physics>
  </world>
</sdf>

```
